text: -What'll it be, boys?

-We're gonna have
two Guinness and --

Eddie, whatever you want.
-No, we're not gonna drink
that cheap crap that you like.

We're here to celebrate
you getting your

head out of your ass and
pitching us into the playoffs.
-I feel like I just got insulted

and complimented
at the same time.

-Harvey Specter.
Nice to meet you.

Macallan 25. Three of 'em.
-Hey, Eddie doesn't need that.

-Yes, he does. Eddie,
it is the smoothest drink

you'll ever taste.
-Harvey, he'd be happy

with pineapple juice
from across the street.

-Uhn-uhn. I want the smoothest
drink you ever taste.

-See? Eddie gets it.
-Eddie,

you don't even like beer.
-Just relax, buddy boy.
-Yeah...buddy boy.

-Goddamn it, Harvey!
You lied. This is awful.
I'm getting a pineapple juice.
-I mean, money well spent.

Harvey, I really
appreciated this.

I needed to get my mind
off things.

-Ted, I'm gonna tell you
something,
and you didn't hear it from me.

But I called my people
at the DA's office,

and word is Pellegrini has
someone in your office.
-That's how they found Billy.

Harvey, do I need to be worried?
-No.

Right now it's you
against Pellegrini.

Even he knows
he gets rid of you...
they'll send an army after him.

-[ Sighs ]
Thanks, Harvey.

How long are you gonna play
for the prosecutor's league?

You left the DA like,
five, years ago.

-You want to play
for a championship with me?

Or would you like to play
for a championship against me?

-Oh, you think
I couldn't take you?
-There's only one Batman.

-I know.
You just bought him a drink.

-I know.
I bought myself a drink,
and I'm Batman.
You could be Robin.

-I'm Superman.
-That's cheating.

-That's exactly what
Batman would say to Superman.

You're Batman. I'm Superman.
No take backs.

-Said Robin. I win.
-Uh, agree to disagree.
Don't say anything else.

-That is Kryptonite,
by the way.

-It doesn't matter.
I'm Robin.

-Now?
-Yeah.
-To Robin.
